value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|That took even longer than we
expected, but I'm glad to see that
the town is in good shape now.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I am, too. Seeing the townspeople in
high spirits has lifted my own. They're
so grateful for our help...$k$pPrince Alfonse, do you often head
out and aid the people of Askr like
this?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well... Normally the royal family
wouldn't be so hands-on.$k$pIn fact, when I decided to join the
Order of Heroes...there were many
who opposed that choice.$k$pMy father is one of them. He was very
angry with me. He still won't see me
when I'm at the royal residence...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Oh, dear...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Deep down, I know my father and I
feel the same way about this kingdom
and its people.$k$pHe's leading the knights in the fight
to save our kingdom even as we
speak. I must do my part, too.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Alfonse, $Nu!
Princess Fjorm!$k$pLook at this! The townspeople gave
me all of these apples. It's their
way of saying thanks!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|That's so kind.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|By the way...the elder asked me to
give you this...$k$pIt's just a bundle of oddly-colored hay.
What's it for?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Just a little something I asked him for.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|We can't eat hay, brother.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It's not for eating. When it burns, it
gives off colored smoke... It's handy
if we need a signal on the quick.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|All right, everyone! Ready to move?
Let's march!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Enemies are everywhere... It's clear
that they're focusing on this area.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We've almost made it to the gate,
but these last few steps will be the
most dangerous, I fear.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|This proves that we're on the right
track. They want to keep us from
getting to Nifl at any cost!$k$p$EFace_Cool|Onward!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well done.$k$pLet's use this to our advantage.
Move carefully and quietly—we'll be
there before they notice us!$k$p$Sbs150|
